content:
Brain has not been spared the impact of COVID19. On the contrary, the neurological effects of the virus are significant. There is a "parallel pandemic" with respect to mental health.
To study COVID19-related #brain-disorders and #mental #health issues, by building on the strengths of the EBRAINS infrastructure, we have opened a call, seeking new partner(s) for Human Brain Project to explore these issues:

https://lnkd.in/dbnvrDS
